Class BitsWordElement

io.openems.edge.bridge.modbus.api.element.AbstractSingleWordElement<BitsWordElement,Boolean[]>
io.openems.edge.bridge.modbus.api.element.BitsWordElement
public class BitsWordElement extends AbstractSingleWordElement<BitsWordElement,Boolean[]>
A BitsWordElement is an UnsignedWordElement where every bit represents a Boolean value.
